            counter = 0
            while True:
                layer = p.getlayer(counter)
                if layer != None:
                    i = int(counter)
                    x = p[0][i].fields
                    t = exclude_layers(x, layer.name)
                    s = rename_layer(t, layer.name)
                    v = '{"' + layer.name.replace('.', '_') + '[' + str(i) + ']' + '":' + str(s) + '}'
                    s = eval(v)
                    try:
                        del s['HTTP[3]']
                        del s['HTTP[5]']
                    except KeyError:
                        pass
                    packet.update(s)
                else:
                    break
                counter += 1
